text.text_translated:
PHA is a space rock that could hit Earth.  
HAMMER is a NASA plan to protect Earth.  
It is a real plan, not a story.  
The plan would fire eight‑ton rockets at the asteroid.  
The rockets would try to move the asteroid off its path.  
If the asteroid is close, rockets would carry a big thing.  
The big thing would try to blow the asteroid up instead.

best_attempt.text_translated:
PHA is a space rock that could hit Earth.  
HAMMER is a NASA plan.  
HAMMER stands for Hypervelocity Asteroid Mitigation Mission.  
It is for Emergency Response.  
The plan can try to bump an approaching asteroid.  
It would move the asteroid off its path.  
Eight‑ton rockets would be fired at the asteroid.  
The rockets would try to change the asteroid’s direction.  
If the asteroid was too close to Earth, the plan would not work.  
The rockets would then carry big bombs.  
The bombs would try to blow the asteroid up.
